faqPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqPage.description: Answers to the most common questions about Detect AI

questions.a: Detect AI is an advanced system that uses AI to detect diseases by analyzing medical images like X-rays.
It relies on deep learning models trained on millions of images and compares your upload to detect findings.
Yes, it is cleared for clinical use as a physician-assist tool. Always consult a doctor for confirmation.

questions.q: How do I upload an image?
questions.a: After signing in, go to Upload X-ray and drag the file or pick it. JPG, PNG, DICOM are supported.
Typically 10-30 seconds depending on image size and quality.
Yes, every analysis is saved to your profile for later review.
We use strong encryption and strict controls. Your images and medical data are protected.
Only you and your authorized physician. We never share without your consent.
We comply with medical data standards (HIPAA-like) and enforce strict privacy policies.
Yes, creating an account is free.
We offer tiered plans; see pricing for details.
You can cancel anytime from account settings without extra fees.
Email support@detect-ai.com, use Contact page, or live chat.

questions.q: What if I face a technical issue?
questions.a: Contact support immediately; we'll help you resolve it quickly.
Yes, our support team is available around the clock.

faqPage.ctaSubtitle: Reach out and we'll be happy to assist
